title: Design for Printed Textile-Plusses, Series #705
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
medium: Blueprint on off-white wove paper, graphite
description: The object is in two parts; the first design consists of three horizontal rows of "plus signs" [+]  imprinted in blueprint. A second blueprint is fstened to the first with two staples at left side. The design consists of several pieces of "Plusses" pattern glued to the paper.
name: Diazo print
